about_the_game:
Free wallpaper pack - Includes 4 Sir'HaXXX wallpapers for those of you who love the artwork and would like to see it on your desktop.

High quality 3840x2160, 1920x1080 and 1280x720 resolutions of the wallpapers in PNG format included. Use the correct resolution wallpaper for your display to give the best results.

New content may be added over time.
Wallpapers accessed via "Wallpaper Pack" folder located in the game installation folder. Enjoy.

Personal use only.

name: Sir'HaXXX - Wallpaper Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD E-300 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6310 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 16 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Disk space required does not include game installation size and may increase with content updates.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
